h3_title: Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Since Chen Loong doesn't have a whole lot of health or armor, use everything in your arsenal to keep him staggered and unable to hit back whenever possible, and you can rush him down before the fight goes on too long and you start taking double damage too often.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chen_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Chen Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Chen Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Since Chen Loong doesn't have a whole lot of health or armor, use everything in your arsenal to keep him staggered and unable to hit back whenever possible, and you can rush him down before the fight goes on too long and you start taking double damage too often.
